elif PIF-8 == '**U**' then '**unknown**'

At least two codings:
 * https://standards.digital.health.nz/ns/central-region/pas-language AND 
 * urn:ietf:bcp:47
ietf:bcp:47 includes all iso-639 language codes;

[Language Concept Map](./ConceptMap-nzcr-language-map.html) provides mapping from [WebPAS raw code](./CodeSystem-nzcr-raw-language-cs.html)
**Note:** `zOTH` and `zTEO` codes are mapped to special systems
PID-15 is by definition the patient's preferred language
